title: ESP-20-EscortQuoteRequest Request Schema
description: Schema for escort quote request sent by BRM to escort provider

quoteRef.description: Unique Id generated for this quote request (the OSE booking request id)

requestAuthoriser.description: Details of the person/case worker who raised this request.

subjects.description: The person/s who needs to be escorted

requester.description: Basic contact details of the requester and/or the team

teamName.description: Group name to contact if named contact not available.

travelDetails.description: Target date range, destination, departure and various restrictions

preferredTravelDate.description: Preferred date for OSE to be made. Date in the ISO-8601 format of [YYYY]-[MM]-[DD

latestTravelDate.description: Latest date that OSE can be made (optional). Date in the ISO-8601 format of [YYYY]-[MM]-[DD

daysNotToTravel.description: Any days when travel should not be made (free text)

flightType.description: Preferred flight type (eg Direct flight preferred)

destination.description: The destination to which the subject should be sent

departureAirport.description: The departure airport(s) to be used (free text)

airlineRestrictions.description: Restrictions on which airlines that can be used

refundableTickets.description: Whether or not flight tickets should be refundable

extraInformation.description: Any other information pertinent to the quote request

isRestricted.description: Whether or not restriction applies to this quote request
Whether or not airline restrictions apply to this quote request

restrictions.description: Restrictions on which airlines that can be used (free text)

isRestricted.description: Whether or not transit restrictions apply to this quote request

restrictions.description: Restrictions on which countries can not be transitted

subject.description: Subject details. person Id is always present. Mostly HO OR Port Reference is present

personId.description: Person id found in the cid

portReference.description: Port Reference Number if present. Used in case of transport from Ferry etc

firstName.description: Given Name of the subject including any middle name

lastName.description: Family Name of the subject. May be known or not

aliases.description: Alternative Names of the subject if any

nationality.description: Nationality of the person from CID. e.g. Angola, British Citizen

dateOfBirth.description: Date in the ISO-8601 format yyyy-MM-dd. Is it mandatory?

risksPosed.description: Risks can be Medical or Non-Medical and both will be captured here

riskCode.description: This will be the DS Risk code e.g. DEMC, DE

riskDescription.description: DS descriptions for the codes e.g. DS: Existing Medical Condition, DS: Escape Risk

riskStartDate.description: Date in the ISO-8601 format of YYYY-MM-DD for when the risk starts

riskEndDate.description: Date in the ISO-8601 format of YYYY-MM-DD for when the risk ends
